name: BackFire (itch) (jacksontheel)
description:
WASD to move.

Space bar to shoot.

Part shoot-em-up, part bullet hell, all classic arcade action. BackFire puts you in the shoes of a gunship pilot, out to destroy hordes of space demons. Once you do, the strangest thing happens... You'll have to find out what for yourself.

Made in 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
